comments:
This exception is being thrown 100's of times in the junit bucket because markers are being created at the end of the test run, after the project has been deleted...

Created an attachment (id=69365)
patch for resources which do not exist

Patch fixes ResourceException thrown when the junit testcases run. I checked to see if the resource exists in TaskListUtility. We are also getting many ResourceException's similar to the following. I also fixed that by checking to see if the resource exists in ValidatorMetaData.
